properties.name: operation
properties.description: Get your company's ProfitWell account settings

options.name: Get Settings
options.description: Get your company's ProfitWell account settings

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Retrieve financial metric broken down by day for either the current month or the last

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve financial metric broken down by day for either the current month or the last

properties.name: type
properties.description: Retrieve financial metric broken down by day for either the current month or the last

options.name: Daily
options.description: Retrieve financial metric broken down by day for either the current month or the last

options.name: Monthly
options.description: Retrieve all monthly financial metric for your company

properties.name: month
properties.description: Can only be the current or previous month. Format should be YYYY-MM.

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: options
properties.description: Only return the metric for this Plan ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: plan_id
options.description: Only return the metric for this Plan ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: dailyMetrics
options.description: Number of paying customers

options.name: Active Customers
options.description: Number of paying customers

options.name: Churned Customers
options.description: Number of paying customers who churned

options.name: Churned Recurring Revenue
options.description: MRR lost to churn (voluntary and delinquent)

options.name: Cumulative Net New MRR
options.description: New + Upgrades - Downgrades - Churn MRR, cumulative for the month up through the given day

options.name: Cumulative New Trialing Customers
options.description: Number of new trialing customers, cumulative for the month up through the given day

options.name: Downgraded Customers
options.description: Number of existing customers who net downgraded

options.name: Downgraded Recurring Revenue
options.description: How much downgrades and plan length decreases affect your MRR

options.name: Future Churn MRR
options.description: MRR that will be lost when users who are currently cancelled actually churn

options.name: New Customers
options.description: Number of new, paying customers you have

options.name: New Recurring Revenue
options.description: MRR from new users

options.name: Reactivated Customers
options.description: Number of customers who have reactivated

options.name: Reactivated Recurring Revenue
options.description: How much MRR comes from reactivated customers

options.name: Recurring Revenue
options.description: Your company's MRR

options.name: Upgraded Customers
options.description: Number of existing customers who net upgraded

options.name: Upgraded Recurring Revenue
options.description: How much upgrades and plan length increases affect your MRR

options.name: monthlyMetrics
options.description: Number of paying customers

options.name: Active Customers
options.description: Number of paying customers

options.name: Active Trialing Customers
options.description: Number of trialing customers

options.name: Average Revenue Per User
options.description: ARPU

options.name: Churned Customers
options.description: Number of paying customers who churned

options.name: Churned Customers Cancellations
options.description: Number of customers who churned by cancelling their subscription(s)

options.name: Churned Customers Delinquent
options.description: Number of customers who churned because they failed to pay you

options.name: Churned Recurring Revenue
options.description: Revenue lost to churn (voluntary and delinquent)

options.name: Churned Recurring Revenue Cancellations
options.description: Revenue lost to customers who churned by cancelling their subscription(s)

options.name: Churned Recurring Revenue Delinquent
options.description: Revenue lost to customers who churned delinquent

options.name: Churned Trialing Customers
options.description: Number of trialling customers who churned

options.name: Converted Customers
options.description: Number of customers who converted from trialing to active

options.name: Converted Recurring Revenue
options.description: How much MRR comes from users who converted from trialing to active

options.name: Customer Churn Cancellations Rate
options.description: Percentage of paying customers who churned by cancelling their subscription(s)

options.name: Customer Churn Delinquent Rate
options.description: Percentage of paying customers who churned because they failed to pay you

options.name: Customer Churn Rate
options.description: Percentage of paying customers who churned

options.name: Customer Conversion Rate
options.description: Percent of trialing customers who converted

options.name: Customer Retention Rate
options.description: Percent of customers active last month who are still active this month

options.name: Downgrade Customers
options.description: Number of existing customers who net downgraded

options.name: Downgrade Rate
options.description: Downgrade revenue as a percent of existing revenue

options.name: Downgrade Recurring Revenue
options.description: How much downgrades and plan length decreases affect your MRR

options.name: Existing Customers
options.description: Number of paying customers you had at the start of the given month

options.name: Existing Recurring Revenue
options.description: Your company's MRR at the start of the given month

options.name: Existing Trialing Customers
options.description: Number of trialing customers who existed at the start of the month

options.name: Growth_Rate
options.description: Rate at which your company's MRR has grown over the previous month

options.name: Lifetime Value
options.description: Average LTV, as calculated at the end of the given period

options.name: New Customers
options.description: Number of new, paying customers you have

options.name: New Recurring Revenue
options.description: MRR from new users

options.name: New Trailing Customers
options.description: Number of new trialing customers

options.name: Plan Changed Rate
options.description: Net change in revenue as a percentage of existing revenue

options.name: Plan Changed Recurring Revenue
options.description: Net change in revenue for this plan

options.name: Reactivated Customers
options.description: Number of customers who have reactivated

options.name: Reactivated Recurring Revenue
options.description: How much MRR comes from reactivated customers

options.name: Recurring Revenue
options.description: Your company's MRR

options.name: Revenue Churn Cancellations Rate
options.description: Voluntary churn revenue as a percent of the month's starting revenue

options.name: Revenue Churn Delinquent_ Rate
options.description: Delinquent churn revenue as a percent of the month's starting revenue

options.name: Revenue Churn Rate
options.description: Revenue lost to churn as a percentage of existing revenue

options.name: Revenue Retention Rate
options.description: Percent of revenue coming from existing customers that was retained by the end of the month

options.name: Upgrade Rate
options.description: Upgrade revenue as a percent of existing revenue

options.name: Upgraded Customers
options.description: Number of existing customers who net upgraded

options.name: Upgraded Recurring Revenue
options.description: How much upgrades and plan length increases affect your MRR

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
